content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it quite convenient, being in the city center and close to all important facilities. Now, let's negotiate the rental price. I'm aiming for the highest possible price. Remember, I won't accept anything less than what I consider fair.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment sounds very attractive, especially with its central location and proximity to amenities. I'm sure it will be a great place to live. Could you tell me your initial price for the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Response] Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate your kind words about my apartment. However, I must maintain a sense of mystery. I'm aiming for the highest possible price, and I won't reveal my initial price. Let's see how much you're willing to offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Since you're aiming high, I'll start with a modest offer. How about 600 Euros per month? This takes into account the unfurnished state of the apartment and the current market rates in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Response] 600 Euros per month seems a bit too modest for my liking, Yi-Nuo Wang. Remember, my apartment is newly built and in the city center. I think you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see your point, Mister Schmidt. Newly built and central locations often command a higher price. How about 700 Euros per month? This reflects the quality and convenience of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Response]700 Euros per month is more like it, Yi-Nuo Wang. But remember, I'm a greedy landlord. I'm sure you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet in the middle. How about 750 Euros per month? This is a fair price considering the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Response]750 Euros per month is a step in the right direction, Yi-Nuo Wang. But remember, I'm a greedy landlord. I think you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. Since you're looking for the highest price, I'll offer 800 Euros per month. This is a competitive rate for an apartment of this size and condition in Magdeburg. I hope this meets your expectations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Response]800 Euros per month is closer to what I was hoping for, Yi-Nuo Wang. But remember, I'm a greedy landlord. I think you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm willing to go up to 850 Euros per month. This is a fair and reasonable price for both parties, taking into account the apartment's features and the market value. I hope this is acceptable to you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Response]850 Euros per month is more like it, Yi-Nuo Wang. But remember, I'm a greedy landlord. I think you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I'm reaching my limit. I can't afford to go much higher. If you're not satisfied with 850 Euros per month, I respectfully decline to continue negotiations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [Response]I understand, Yi-Nuo Wang. But remember, I'm a greedy landlord. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you're not willing to offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mister Schmidt. It seems we've reached an impasse. If you're not willing to accept 850 Euros per month, I respectfully terminate the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
